short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send Personalized videos on Linkedin with Generative AI Tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of low response rates on LinkedIn outreach? Personaliz.ai is your secret weapon to skyrocket engagement and close more deals.

Here's how it works:

-Create personalized video campaigns: Craft engaging videos with your message, tailored to each prospect's name and interests.
-Clone your voice & lip-sync: No need to be in front of the camera! Personaliz.ai uses AI to seamlessly lip-sync your recorded message.
-Auto-generate videos: Upload your list of contacts, and Personaliz.ai automatically creates personalized videos for each one.
-Seamless LinkedIn integration: The extension displays personalized video links directly on your prospect's LinkedIn page.
-Engage and qualify leads: Once they click, they'll land on an interactive page with your video, additional info, and a calendar link to book meetings directly.

Benefits:

-Boost response rates by up to 300%: Stand out from the crowd with personalized video outreach that grabs attention.
-Save time and effort: Automate video creation and outreach for efficient lead generation.
-Increase engagement: Interactive video landing pages capture interest and keep leads engaged.
-Close more deals: Build trust and qualify leads faster with personalized video communication.

Get started for FREE:

Sign up at https://personaliz.ai
Install the Chrome extension
Create your first personalized video campaign
Experience the power of personalized video marketing on LinkedIn!
